<script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div     (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);

r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>


<!--END content for url: http://sportv.globo.com/servico/sportv/nba/header.html-->

          <div class="col-lg-8 col-sm-8 col-10 team">

            <span class="pct">

              <span class="team-name"><a data-ng-href="/teamindex/#!/#{{ team.profile.conference.toLowerCase() }}"><span data-ng-bind-html="team.profile.displayConference"></span> <span data-ng-i18next="leagueLeadingTeams.conference"></span></a></span>
            </div>

</div>

<div class="row">

<div id="main" class="r7container-8  is-blog-main  is-blog-main is-generic-hotsite  is-blog-main is-generic-hotsite " data-browser-name="safari">

<div id="heading" class="r7cl7 ref-blog">

          {{#each articles}}            

            <li id="nativeads_position_{{@index}}" class="{{#not_empty cover_image_url}}nwl-has-img{{/not_empty}} nwl-row {{#if showDate}}new-date{{/if}}">

              {{/if}}

                <span class="nwl-news-time">{{timeFormat first_published_at}}</span>

                {{#not_empty cover_image_url}}
                <span data-href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" class="nwl-wpr-cover box">
                  <div class="r7-shareit-holder">                      
                      <div class="image-holder" style="position: relative">
                      <img alt="" class="article-video-icon-tag" style="{{#not_empty is_video}}display: block{{/not_empty}}" src="data:image/png;base64," />

                        </a>
                            <div class="r7-shareit-bar no-text">
        <ul class="r7-shareit small">
          <li data-social-type="facebook" title="Compartilhe no Facebook" class="r7-icons r7-facebook shareit"></li>

        </ul>
    </div>

                </span>

                      <a data-social-headline="{{section_name}}"  data-social-lead="{{treatment_title title}}" data-shorten="{{url}}" href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" class="nwl-link" target="{{is_r7_domain url}}">

                      </a>

tabela-icone-d"></span></td></tr><tr class="tabela-body-linha"><td class="tabela-pontos-ponto">12</td><td>29</td><td>2</td><td>6</td><td>21</td><td>29</td><td>66</td><td>-37</td><td>13.8</td><td class="tabela-pontos-ultimos-jogos"><span class="tabela-icone tabela-icone-circulo tabela-icone-v"></span><span class="tabela-icone tabela-icone-circulo tabela-icone-d"></span><span class="tabela-icone tabela-icone-circulo tabela-icone-d"></span><span class="tabela-icone tabela-icone-circulo tabela-icone-d"></span><span class="tabela-icone tabela-icone-circulo tabela-icone-d"></span></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div></section><footer class="legenda-classificacao"><div class="legenda-grupos"><div class="legenda-grupo"><span class="legenda-label"><span class="tabela-icone" style="background-color:#0000ff;"></span> Liga dos Campeões</span><span class="legenda-label"><span class="tabela-icone" style="background-color:#00ffff;"></span> Liga Europa</span><span class="legenda-label"><span class="tabela-icone" style="background-color:#ff0000;"></span> Rebaixados</span></div><div class="legenda-grupo"><span class="legenda-label"><span class="tabela-icone tabela-icone-positiva"></span> subiu</span><span class="legenda-label"><span class="tabela-icone tabela-icone-negativa"></span> caiu</span><span class="legenda-label"><span class="tabela-icone tabela-icone-e"></span> manteve</span></div><div class="legenda-grupo"><span class="legenda-label"><span class="tabela-icone tabela-icone-circulo tabela-icone-v"></span> vitoria</span><span class="legenda-label"><span class="tabela-icone tabela-icone-circulo tabela-icone-e"></span> empate</span><span class="legenda-label"><span class="tabela-icone tabela-icone-circulo tabela-icone-d"></span> derrota</span></div></div><span id="ver-regulamento-js" class="legenda-regulamento">ver regulamento</span><div class="disclaimer"></div></footer><aside class="lista-de-jogos class="placar-jogo-equipes-nome">Sampdoria</span></span></div></div></li></ul></aside><script type="text/template" id="tabela-regulamento-texto-js">
    As 20 equipes se enfrentam em turno e returno e quem somar mais pontos é o campeão. Os dois primeiros colocados se classificam para a Liga dos Campeões, enquanto o 3º disputa a fase classificatória. Os 4º e 5º colocados se classificam para a Liga Europa. Os três últimos são rebaixados. Critérios de desempate: 1) Confronto direto; 2) Saldo de gols; 3) Gols pró.
</script></article></div>
</div></div></div><div class="row show-for-medium-up"><div class="column
                            medium-24
                            large-24 large-offset-0
                            xlarge-22 xlarge-offset-1"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_slb_meio"><div id="banner_slb_meio" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div></div><div class="row small-collapse medium-uncollapse"><div class="areatemplate-direita-superior
                    column
                    medium-20 medium-offset-2 medium-pull-2 
                    large-9 large-offset-0 large-pull-0
                    xlarge-7 xlarge-offset-1 xlarge-pull-1
                    float-right"></div><div class="areatemplate-esquerda
            column
            medium-20 medium-offset-2
            large-15 large-offset-0
            xlarge-14 xlarge-offset-1

    var glb_realtime_map = {
        site: 'globoesporte',
        categories: ['home'],
        url: 'http://globoesporte.globo.com/futebol/futebol-internacional/futebol-italiano/'
    };

    var realtime = function(realtimeLoaded, msg){
        if(realtimeLoaded){
            return;
        }

        $.getScript('http://s.glbimg.com/bu/rt/js/glb-rt.js', function(){
            $.ajax({
                dataType: 'jsonp',
                
                url: 'http://s.glbimg.com/es/ge/static/live/globoesporte/json/globoesporte-home-agregador.js',
                
                jsonpCallback: 'glbrealtime_callback',
                cache: true,
                success: function(json){
